titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Don Gale KSL editorial video collection 1938-20101978-1997
Gale, Don KSL editorial video collection
titlestmt.author: Finding aid created by Don Gale

publicationstmt.publisher: Multimedia Archives, J. Willard Marriott Library, University of Utah

profiledesc.creation: Encoded in Adobe Dreamweaver by Molly Creel and Michael Hinderaker 2012.
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid encoded in English in Latin script.
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

repository.corpname: University of Utah Libraries, Special Collections

did.unittitle: Don Gale KSL editorial video collection

physdesc.extent: 125 U-matic videocassettes, 59 Betacam videocassettes, 6 VHS videocassettes, 115 DVDs.

did.abstract: The Don Gale KSL editorial video collection (1938-2010, bulk 1978-1997) consists of the complete 19-year series of daily editorials delivered by Gale at the end of the evening news on Salt Lake City television station KSL. The collection touches on myriad local and national issues affecting Utahns and highlights the state's social, political, environmental and cultural history during the latter half of the 20th century. The collection also contains various tributes to local businessman and philanthropist "Izzi" Wagner. Gale began writing editorials in 1977, went on the air in 1978, and continued broadcasting until his retirement in 1998.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: G. Donald Gale wrote, produced and broadcast daily editorial segments for KSL News in Salt Lake City, Utah from 1977 until his retirement in 1998. Former Vice President for News and Public Affairs at Bonneville International Corporation, Gale earned Bachelor of Arts (B.A.), Master of Arts (M.A.) and Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) degrees from the University of Utah and served on the faculty there and at Weber State University. He is the author of the book Bags to Riches about Utah businessman and philanthropist "Izzi" Wagner. Don Gale continues to write a monthly column for the Deseret Morning News and the Ogden Standard-Examiner. He is President of Words, Words, Words, Inc., a communication consulting company.

scopecontent.p: The Don Gale KSL editorial video collection (1938-2010) consists of the complete 19-year series of daily editorials delivered by Gale at the end of the evening news on Salt Lake City television station KSL. The collection touches on myriad local and national issues affecting Utahns and highlights the state's social, political, environmental and cultural history during the latter half of the 20th century. The collection also contains various tributes to local businessman and philanthropist "Izzi" Wagner.

All of Gale's original editorials have been digitized and are available for viewing on the DVDs detailed in this finding aid. A history and list of the editorials may also be found in Gale's book KSL Editorials 1978-1997: A Personal History, which is available with the paper collection registers in the Special Collections Reading Room. Izzi Wagner materials are available on the DVDs listed at the end of the collection.

arrangement.p: The materials are arranged chronologically. KSL editorials are listed first, followed by materials about Izzi Wagner.

accessrestrict.p: Materials must be used on-site; no use of original material, access copies will be made available for viewing. Five business days advanced notice required. Access to parts of this collection may be restricted under provisions of state or federal law, condition of the material, or by donor.

userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the researcher to obtain any necessary copyright clearances.
Permission to publish material from the Don Gale KSL editorial video collection must be obtained from the Special Collections Multimedia Archivist.

prefercite.p: Initial Citation: Don Gale KSL editorial video collection A1055. Special Collections and Archives. University of Utah, J. Willard Marriott. Salt Lake City, Utah.

acqinfo.p: Donated by Don Gale in 2010 and 2012.

processinfo.p: Processed by John Hammer in 2011 and Molly Creel in 2012.

relatedmaterial.p: See also the Don Gale papers (Accn 2584).

controlaccess.corpname: KSL (Television station : Salt Lake City, Utah)
controlaccess.subject: Editorial
Television news
Media and Communication
Moving Images

scopecontent.p: Editorials before August 15 were written by Don Gale and delivered by L.H. Curtis. Beginning on August 15, 1978, editorials were written and broadcast by Don Gale. Although editorials were not routinely recorded for archvie during this period, the following editorials were preserved.

scopecontent.p: Induction of Don Gale. Hosted at University of Utah.
Twenty years of Don Gale's history, humor, and editorial comment. Directed by Michael Gale, son of Don Gale. Produced by Don Gale.
Video transfer from 16mm film taken by I.J. Wagner during a visit to Hollywood in 1938.
